officialTitle: Comparison of the Effect of Vasopressin, Steroid, and Epinephrine Treatment in Patients With Out-of-hospital Cardiac Arrest: Multi-center, Double Blind, Randomized, Placebo-controlled Study
inclusionCriteria:
* The group of patients who participated in the study included adults aged at least 19 years among the atraumatic CA outpatients who came to the ER and received CPR.
* Must have minimum age of 19 Years
